statements: UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_description = 'Clicked on a link' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_type = 'Search' , last_interaction = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_description = 'Updated behavior' WHERE user_id = 101 AND behavior_type = 'Positive';
UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_type = 'Neutral', last_interaction = NOW() WHERE user_id = 202 AND behavior_description LIKE '%exciting%';
UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'alice' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE augmented_reality_logs SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3e4-1234-5678-abcd-1234567890ef';
UPDATE augmented_reality_logs SET timestamp = '2022-01-31 08:00:00', action_taken = 'Enable AR Feature' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3e4-1234-5678-abcd-1234567890ef';
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE ar_experiences SET ar_content_url='example_url_2' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE users SET username='John', email='john@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_behaviors SET timestamp='2022-01-01 12:00:00', behavior_type='like' WHERE behavior_id=1;
UPDATE users SET age = 25 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ar_settings SET notification_enabled = true, contact_enabled = false WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET age = age + 1 WHERE id = 'f749a9c3-88c9-4f5b-917f-4e3f03e4e1cf';
UPDATE ar_settings SET contact_enabled = TRUE, location_enabled = FALSE WHERE user_id = '8b917bd4-2acb-4c30-a1f5-776fcd0c3982';
UPDATE users SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ar_devices SET device_name = 'AR Glasses', device_type = 'Wearable', user_id = 2 WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ar_devices SET device_name = 'Smart Glasses', device_type = 'Wearable' WHERE user_id = 2;
